attributes.action: Put a stop to Nick Clegg recieving a Knighthood
attributes.background:
This man has tried to obstruct Brexit, tried his best to lower Britain's crediblity, putting our country down at every opportunity and speaking against the will of the people.
He has also lied on the tv many times, he does not deserve to be rewarded with a knighthood !!

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about honours or appointments.
